summary.para: Represents the administrator override power policy settings.

remarks.para: structure defines limits to certain power policy values that are applied globally to all users' power schemes. The values in the ADMINISTRATOR_POWER_POLICY
structure override any settings selected by the user in the Power Options control panel program.
To set an administrator override policy, call the function.

summary.para: The minimum system power sleep state. This member must be one of the enumeration type values between PowerSystemSleeping1 (power state S1) and PowerSystemHibernate (power state S4).
The maximum system power sleep state. This member must be one of the enumeration type values between PowerSystemSleeping1 (power state S1) and PowerSystemHibernate (power state S4).
The minimum allowable video idle time-out before turning the display device off, in seconds.
The maximum allowable video idle time-out before turning the display device off, in seconds.
The minimum allowable disk idle time before flushing the cache manager and spinning down a hard disk device, in seconds.
The maximum allowable disk idle time before flushing the cache manager and spinning down a hard disk device, in seconds.
